dev-1.x.name: drupal/rc4_email

security-coverage.message: Project has not opted into security advisory coverage!

dev-1.x.description: Obscures email addresses found in mailto links generated by Drupal's l() function and saves a RC4 encrypted copy of the original email address and reinserted back to the HTML once decrypted by Javascript. Prevents bots from harvesting email addresses from mailto link.
